trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de Acionador inicia uma <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> e distribui as animações para as respetivas propriedades e os objetos visados.

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma ação de BeginStoryboard com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>para aplicar animações as respetivas propriedades de destino e iniciá-los.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard começa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>chamando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>referenciar quando é acionada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Quando iniciar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>numa propriedade que já está a ser animada por outro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>propriedade BeginStoryboard determina como continua a animação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: Colocar em pausa, retomar, parar, caso contrário, o controlo um guião gráfico principal interativamente para conseguir fazer pausa, retomar ou caso contrário, controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>que tinha sido declarado no markup interativamente, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do respetivo BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode controlar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (tais como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar a consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>BeginStoryboard é não especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No código, pode utilizar os métodos interativos do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>classe para controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>que foi aplicada com um BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Como é o caso quando utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objetos, deve fornecer um nome para o BeginStoryboard respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>ser interativamente controllable.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento apropriado mão-off ao iniciar um relógio de animação neste guião gráfico principal

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##Utilizando a compor HandoffBehavior quando aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>para uma propriedade utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos anteriormente associados essa propriedade continuam a consumir recursos de sistema; o sistema de temporização não remove automaticamente estes relógios.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de desempenho quando aplica um grande número de relógios utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, deve remover os relógios composição da propriedade animada depois de estarem concluídas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias formas para remover um relógio: - para remover todos os relógios de uma propriedade, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>método do objeto animado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a propriedade que está a ser animada como o primeiro parâmetro e `null` como o segundo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá remover todos os relógios de animação da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover um específico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>de uma lista de relógios, utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>obter um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Isto é geralmente feito o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>processador de eventos para um clock.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que os relógios de raiz apenas podem ser controlados por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>devolve de propriedade de um relógio subordinado `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento não denomina-se a duração efetiva do relógio é indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o utilizador tem de determinar quando deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Isto é principalmente um problema para animações em objetos que têm uma duração de tempo.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto é memória libertada, os relógios também estiver desligados e libertação da memória.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os objetos de relógio, consulte [animação e descrição geral do sistema de temporização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Ao nomear o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objeto, o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> pode ser controlado depois de ser iniciado.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Conseguir interromper, retomar ou, caso contrário interativamente controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, definir a propriedade de nome do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>para fazer referência a este nome.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não foi especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>não pode ser afetado interativamente depois-é iniciada; além disso, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>termina ou introduz o período de preenchimento a animação relógios são eliminados depois de.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> que este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> que o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
